participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and organized, Emily balances her responsibilities as a mother with her passion for music and home life.
participant_1.background: I have a baby mobile in my nursery that plays classical music to help my child sleep. I never told my parents about my deployment, but I would tell my friends all about it if I was famous. My favorite band is Nightwish. I'm a homebody, but I love my kids! My favorite food is pasta.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Energetic and resourceful, Sarah thrives in her role as a mom and blogger, finding joy in her busy life.
participant_2.background: I love eating at the local sports bar with my son after his games. I'm proud of being able to juggle my blog and being a mom of five. I enjoy a Coke with my burger. My father is a wildlife veterinarian and my mother is an animal rights activist. The weather is irrelevant to me.

content.text: How do you juggle your blog and being a mom of five? I'm a mom of one and I find it hard sometimes!
It can be hard, but my family is my everything. My blog is a way for me to share my love of fashion and parenting with others.
That's amazing! I'm impressed that you can do both so well.
Thanks! It's all about time management and prioritizing.
I totally agree! I have to be very organized or I would fall apart.
I know what you mean! I use a lot of lists to keep track of everything.
Me too! I love lists. They make me feel like I have everything under control.
So, what are your favorite things to do with your kids?
We love to go to the park, play games, and read books together.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun together!
We do! We're a very close-knit family.
